arts.sum: New signing Nick Woltemade made an instant impression on his Newcastle debut, scoring the only goal in a 1-0 home win against Wolves. The Magpies are still adapting to life after Alexander Isak, and w...

arts.ttl: Barcelona summer signing unlikely to start against Newcastle United
arts.sum: Earlier today, FC Barcelona announced the squad list for their upcoming UEFA Champions League clash against Newcastle United. As expected, Lamine Yamal has not made it back in time for the trip to England, as he continues to recover from pubic discomfort. It leaves a gaping hole in the attacking unit for Barcelona, given the […] The post Barcelona summer signing unlikely to start against Newcastle United appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Fabrizio Romano reveals Newcastle offer for Barcelona nemesis
arts.sum: One player Newcastle tried and failed to sign was Inter Milan midfielder Frattesi, Moretto has revealed in his daily slot on Romano's Italian YouTube channel. Frattesi played a key role in Inter's run to the Champions League final last season, scoring decisive goals in the quarter-final success over Bayern Munich and the semi-final against Barcelona.

arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona announce squad for Champions League clash vs Newcastle United
arts.sum: FC Barcelona are set to begin their UEFA Champions League 2025-26 campaign tomorrow, Thursday, with their opening fixture against Premier League side Newcastle United. One day before the game, the Catalan giants announced the squad that will be travelling to the north of England for this match. As expected, there are some notable absences on […] The post Official: Barcelona announce squad for Champions League clash vs Newcastle United appeared first on Sempre Barca.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United v Barcelona: Manager’s big ‘dilemma’ over three positions for CL clash
arts.sum: Barcelona manager Hansi Flick needs to make key decisions when selecting his starting lineup to face Newcastle United in the Champions League on Thursday. Lamine Yamal is set to miss out while Frenkie de Jong, who missed last weekend’s match against Valencia, returned to training. arts.ttl: Newcastle vs Barcelona: Champions League Preview, League Phase Matchday 1, 2025
arts.sum: Newcastle United’s return to Europe’s premier competition begins, as the Toon mark the start of their 2025/26 Champions League campaign by hosting Spanish giants Barcelona . With only three goals scored from their opening four Premier League games, it is no secret that Newcastle United have started this season struggling in front of goal.

arts.ttl: Barcelona Confirm Lamine Yamal Status for Champions League Opener
arts.sum: Lamine Yamal is nursing a groin injury which could become a recurring issue if it’s not treated carefully.

arts.ttl: The cherished Newcastle advantage that can inspire Champions League success over Barcelona
arts.sum: The atmosphere at St, James’ Park is a potent weapon for Newcastle that has helped secure famous wins on European nights

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick with sweet words full of respect for Newcastle United as Barcelona set to fly to Tyneside

arts.ttl: Barcelona do not regret missing out on €100 million-rated Newcastle mainstay
arts.sum: Barcelona are set to face off against Newcastle United this Thursday at St. James’ Park, on Matchday 1 of the 2025/26 UEFA Champions League. The match will pit the reigning La Liga champions against some top players from the Premier League, one of whom happens to be Bruno Guimaraes.
